MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Preston and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.33am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of investigations required to locate and repair a fault on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.18am on the 11th of January 2020.
